## html2pdf() function

Render a HTML string as a PDF file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function html2pdf(config: Config, path: string, html: string, modifyPage?: (page: Page) => Promise<void>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | Config | The pentf configuration object. |
|  path | string | PDF file name to write to. |
|  html | string | Full HTML document to render. |
|  modifyPage | (page: Page) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | An optional async function to modify the <code>page</code> object. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
